original_title: Thomas Verbogt - Ik begon te schrijven toen ik drie was
overview: Documentary about the writer Thomas Verbogt and the creation of his latest work. The film shows how Verbogt takes a radical experience from his earliest childhood as the starting point for a novel. Drawn animations, combined with filmed scenes, depict how the writer's imagination sprouts from a literary character.
tagline: Documentary about the writer Thomas Verbogt and the creation of his latest work.
title: Thomas Verbogt - I started writing when I was three
